Name: Small Device
Bg:
A finely crafted small device, the surface is engraved with ancient text. The inner ring represents the Four Spirits of Heaven, indicating the location.
"East, the Teal Loong, West, the White Tiger, South, the Vermillion Bird, North, the Black Tortoise".
The outer ring represents the Twelve Earthly Branches, indicating the time.
"Zi, Chou, Yin, Mao, Chen, Si, Wu, Wei, Shen, You, Xu, Hai".
